title: China leaders get authority from being Gen. Sec.

content.prompt: Chinese leaders Hu Jintao and Jiang Zemin gained their political authority and effective political power from which of the following?

choices.label: Their position as president or head of state
Their close ties with former Soviet leaders
The power, prestige, and wealth of their families in the precommunist era
